requirements.name: AR1
requirements.description: The system manages a Project named "ACME".

requirements.name: AR2
requirements.description: The Project "ACME" contains two People named "Alice" and "Bob".

requirements.name: AR3
requirements.description: Project "ACME" contains a Task named "Analysis", its Start month is "1", with Duration "3".

requirements.name: AR4
requirements.description: Task "Analysis" requires one Effort with 100% Percentage, and designated Person to be "Alice".

requirements.name: AR5
requirements.description: Project "ACME" contains a Task named "Design", its Start month is "7", with Duration "3".

requirements.name: AR7
requirements.description: Project "ACME" contains a Task named "Implementation", its Start month is "7", with Duration "3".

requirements.name: AR6
requirements.description: Task "Design" requires  one Effort with 100% Percentage, and designated Person to be "Bob".

requirements.name: AR8
requirements.description: Task "Implementation" requires one Effort from "Bob", with 50% Percentage in the Effort, and another Effort from "Alice", with 50% Percentrage in the Effort.
